verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> diligently <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> thee on high <S%H5945><s%> above all nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>:

And all these blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee, if thou shalt hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy store <S%H4863><s%>. store: or, dough, or, kneadingtroughs
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest in <S%H935><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be when thou goest out <S%H3318><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before thy face <S%H6440><s%>: they shall come out <S%H3318><s%> against thee one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> upon thee in thy storehouses <S%H618><s%>, and in all that thou settest <S%H4916><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto; and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> thee in the land <S%H776><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee. storehouses: or, barns

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall establish <S%H6965><s%> thee an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, as he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thee, if thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.

And all people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that thou art called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make thee plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in goods <S%H2896><s%>, in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy ground <S%H127><s%>, in the land <S%H127><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> thee. in goods: or, for good body: Heb. belly

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall open <S%H6605><s%> unto thee his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure <S%H214><s%>, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> unto thy land <S%H776><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all the work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hand <S%H3027><s%>: and thou shalt lend <S%H3867><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, and thou shalt not borrow <S%H3867><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> thee the head <S%H7218><s%>, and not the tail <S%H2180><s%>; and thou shalt be above only <S%H4605><s%>, and thou shalt not be beneath <S%H4295><s%>; if that thou hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> them:

And thou shalt not go aside <S%H5493><s%> from any of the words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, or to the left <S%H8040><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them.

But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>; that all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee:
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be in the field <S%H7704><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be thy basket <S%H2935><s%> and thy store <S%H4863><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%>, the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine <S%H504><s%>, and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest in <S%H935><s%>, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be when thou goest out <S%H3318><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> upon thee cursing <S%H3994><s%>, vexation <S%H4103><s%>, and rebuke <S%H4045><s%>, in all that thou settest <S%H4916><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto for to do <S%H6213><s%>, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>, and until thou perish <S%H6><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%>; because <S%H6440><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of thy doings <S%H4611><s%>, whereby thou hast forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me. for: Heb. which thou wouldest do

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto thee, until he have consumed <S%H3615><s%> thee from off the land <S%H127><s%>, whither thou goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with a consumption <S%H7829><s%>, and with a fever <S%H6920><s%>, and with an inflammation <S%H1816><s%>, and with an extreme burning <S%H2746><s%>, and with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and with blasting <S%H7711><s%>, and with mildew <S%H3420><s%>; and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee until thou perish <S%H6><s%>. sword: or, drought
And thy heaven <S%H8064><s%> that is over thy head <S%H7218><s%> shall be brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> that is under thee shall be iron <S%H1270><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust <S%H6083><s%>: from heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall it come down <S%H3381><s%> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> thee to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%>: thou shalt go out <S%H3318><s%> one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against them, and flee <S%H5127><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them: and shalt be removed <S%H2189><s%> into all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>. removed: Heb. for a removing

And thy carcase <S%H5038><s%> shall be meat <S%H3978><s%> unto all fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and unto the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and no man shall fray them away <S%H2729><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with the botch <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and with the emerods <S%H2914><s%> <S%H6076><s%>, and with the scab <S%H1618><s%>, and with the itch <S%H2775><s%>, whereof thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not be healed <S%H7495><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee with madness <S%H7697><s%>, and blindness <S%H5788><s%>, and astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>:

And thou shalt grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>, as the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropeth <S%H4959><s%> in darkness <S%H653><s%>, and thou shalt not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in thy ways <S%H1870><s%>: and thou shalt be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and spoiled <S%H1497><s%> evermore <S%H3117><s%>, and no man shall save <S%H3467><s%> thee.

Thou shalt betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H7693><s%> with her: thou shalt build <S%H1129><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%>, and thou shalt not dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: thou shalt plant <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, and shalt not gather the grapes <S%H2490><s%> thereof. gather: Heb. profane, or, use it as common meat

Thine ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: thine ass <S%H2543><s%> shall be violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> from before thy face <S%H6440><s%>, and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to thee: thy sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and thou shalt have none to rescue <S%H3467><s%> them. shall not: Heb. shall not return to thee

Thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> unto another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look <S%H7200><s%>, and fail <S%H3616><s%> with longing for them all the day <S%H3117><s%> long: and there shall be no might <S%H410><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%>, and all thy labours <S%H3018><s%>, shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not eat up <S%H398><s%>; and thou shalt be only oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> alway <S%H3117><s%>:
So that thou shalt be mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> which thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> thee in the knees <S%H1290><s%>, and in the legs <S%H7785><s%>, with a sore <S%H7451><s%> botch <S%H7822><s%> that cannot <S%H3201><s%> be healed <S%H7495><s%>, from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of thy foot <S%H7272><s%> unto the top of thy head <S%H6936><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H3212><s%> thee, and thy king <S%H4428><s%> which thou shalt set <S%H6965><s%> over thee, unto a nation <S%H1471><s%> which neither thou nor thy fathers <S%H1><s%> have known <S%H3045><s%>; and there shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>.
And thou shalt become an astonishment <S%H8047><s%>, a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, and a byword <S%H8148><s%>, among all nations <S%H5971><s%> whither the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> thee.

Thou shalt carry <S%H3318><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> into the field <S%H7704><s%>, and shalt gather <S%H622><s%> but little <S%H4592><s%> in <S%H622><s%>; for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume <S%H2628><s%> it.

Thou shalt plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, and dress <S%H5647><s%> them, but shalt neither drink <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%>, nor gather <S%H103><s%> the grapes; for the worms <S%H8438><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> them.

Thou shalt have olive trees <S%H2132><s%> throughout all thy coasts <S%H1366><s%>, but thou shalt not anoint <S%H5480><s%> thyself with the oil <S%H8081><s%>; for thine olive <S%H2132><s%> shall cast <S%H5394><s%> his fruit.

Thou shalt beget <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but thou shalt not enjoy them; for they shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>. thou shalt not: Heb. they shall not be thine
All thy trees <S%H6086><s%> and fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> consume <S%H3423><s%>. consume: or, possess

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within <S%H7130><s%> thee shall get up <S%H5927><s%> above thee very <S%H4605><s%> high <S%H4605><s%>; and thou shalt come down <S%H3381><s%> very <S%H4295><s%> low <S%H4295><s%>.
He shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to thee, and thou shalt not lend <S%H3867><s%> to him: he shall be the head <S%H7218><s%>, and thou shalt be the tail <S%H2180><s%>.

Moreover all these curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon thee, and shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> thee, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> thee, till thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>; because thou hearkenedst <S%H8085><s%> not unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee:
And they shall be upon thee for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder <S%H4159><s%>, and upon thy seed <S%H2233><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Because thou servedst <S%H5647><s%> not the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness <S%H8057><s%>, and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart <S%H3824><s%>, for the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of all things;

Therefore shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against thee, in hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and in thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and in nakedness <S%H5903><s%>, and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all things: and he shall put <S%H5414><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon thy neck <S%H6677><s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> thee.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against thee from far <S%H7350><s%>, from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, as swift as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flieth <S%H1675><s%>; a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose tongue <S%H3956><s%> thou shalt not understand <S%H8085><s%>; understand: Heb. hear

A nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%>, which shall not regard <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the old <S%H2205><s%>, nor shew favour <S%H2603><s%> to the young <S%H5288><s%>: of fierce: Heb. strong of face

And he shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy land <S%H127><s%>, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>: which also shall not leave <S%H7604><s%> thee either corn <S%H1715><s%>, wine <S%H8492><s%>, or oil <S%H3323><s%>, or the increase <S%H7698><s%> of thy kine <S%H504><s%>, or flocks <S%H6251><s%> of thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H6><s%> thee.

And he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, until thy high <S%H1364><s%> and fenced <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%>, wherein <S%H2004><s%> thou trustedst <S%H982><s%>, throughout all thy land <S%H776><s%>: and he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%> throughout all thy land <S%H776><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee.

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thine own body <S%H990><s%>, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and of thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee, in the siege <S%H4692><s%>, and in the straitness <S%H4689><s%>, wherewith thine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> thee: body: Heb. belly

So that the man <S%H376><s%> that is tender <S%H7390><s%> among you, and very <S%H3966><s%> delicate <S%H6028><s%>, his eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward his brother <S%H251><s%>, and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> which he shall leave <S%H3498><s%>:

So that he will not give <S%H5414><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom he shall eat <S%H398><s%>: because he hath nothing left <S%H7604><s%> him in the siege <S%H4692><s%>, and in the straitness <S%H4689><s%>, wherewith thine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> thee in all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>.

The tender <S%H7390><s%> and delicate <S%H6028><s%> woman among you, which would not adventure <S%H5254><s%> to set <S%H3322><s%> the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot <S%H7272><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%> for delicateness <S%H6026><s%> and tenderness <S%H7391><s%>, her eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H3415><s%> toward the husband <S%H376><s%> of her bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and toward her son <S%H1121><s%>, and toward her daughter <S%H1323><s%>,

And toward her young one <S%H7988><s%> that cometh out <S%H3318><s%> from between her feet <S%H7272><s%>, and toward her children <S%H1121><s%> which she shall bear <S%H3205><s%>: for she shall eat <S%H398><s%> them for want <S%H2640><s%> of all things secretly <S%H5643><s%> in the siege <S%H4692><s%> and straitness <S%H4689><s%>, wherewith thine enemy <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> thee in thy gates <S%H8179><s%>. young one: Heb. afterbirth

If thou wilt not observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>, that thou mayest fear <S%H3372><s%> this glorious <S%H3513><s%> and fearful <S%H3372><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, THE LORD <S%H3068><s%> THY GOD <S%H430><s%>;

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will make <S%H6381><s%> thy plagues <S%H4347><s%> wonderful <S%H6381><s%>, and the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%>, even great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>, and sore <S%H7451><s%> sicknesses <S%H2483><s%>, and of long continuance <S%H539><s%>.

Moreover he will bring <S%H7725><s%> upon thee all the diseases <S%H4064><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which thou wast afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H6440><s%>; and they shall cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto thee.

Also every sickness <S%H2483><s%>, and every plague <S%H4347><s%>, which is not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>, them will the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H5927><s%> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>. bring: Heb. cause to ascend
